languages.text: {n}Чрево лифтовой шахты исторгло вас в полумрак аварийного освещения. Запах {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометия{/g} и паленой плоти лишь усиливает чувство тошноты — кажется, у вас сотрясение. Локоть повернут под странным углом, а тело чудовищно саднит. Но у боли есть и хорошая сторона — значит, вы еще живы.{/n}

{n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. The smell of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have suffered a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чрево лифтовой шахты исторгло вас в полумрак аварийного освещения. Запах {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометия{/g} и паленой плоти лишь усиливает чувство тошноты — кажется, у вас сотрясение. Локоть повернут под странным углом, а тело чудовищно саднит. Но у боли есть и хорошая сторона — значит, вы еще живы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the semi-darkness of the emergency lights. The smell of promethium and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is aching something fierce. But there's a silver lining to all the pain, which means that you are not dead yet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hueco del ascensor te ha expulsado a la penumbra de las luces de emergencia. El olor a {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} y carne quemada empeora tus náuseas, lo que confirma que has sufrido una conmoción. Tu codo está doblado en mal ángulo y el dolor atraviesa todo tu cuerpo. Sin embargo, esta agonía tiene un lado bueno: significa que sigues viv{mf|o|a}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. The smell of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have suffered a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hueco del ascensor te ha expulsado a la penumbra de las luces de emergencia. El olor a prometio y carne quemada empeora tus náuseas, lo que confirma que has sufrido una conmoción. Tu codo está doblado en mal ángulo y el dolor atraviesa todo tu cuerpo. Sin embargo, esta agonía tiene un lado bueno: significa que sigues viv{mf|o|a}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エレベーターの昇降路から、非常灯が灯る薄暗い場所に放り出された。{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}と焦げた肉の臭いが吐き気に拍車をかけ、脳しんとうを起こしていることを自覚する。肘はおかしな角度に曲がって、体は痛みに襲われる。しかし、この苦しみにも明るい兆しがある。この体はまだ、生きているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. The smell of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have suffered a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エレベーターの昇降路から、非常灯が灯る薄暗い場所に放り出された。プロメチウムと焦げた肉の臭いが吐き気に拍車をかけ、脳しんとうを起こしていることを自覚する。肘はおかしな角度に曲がって、体は痛みに襲われる。しかし、この苦しみにも明るい兆しがある。この体はまだ、生きているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}电梯猛地将你甩向昏暗的应急灯。空气中{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷{/g}素与焦肉的味道让你恶心不已，证明你遭受了脑震荡。你的肘部扭成了古怪的角度，浑身上下都被疼痛贯穿。不过，疼痛也象征着希望，至少这代表你还没死。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. The smell of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have suffered a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}电梯猛地将你甩向昏暗的应急灯。空气中钷素与焦肉的味道让你恶心不已，证明你遭受了脑震荡。你的肘部扭成了古怪的角度，浑身上下都被疼痛贯穿。不过，疼痛也象征着希望，至少这代表你还没死。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Aufzugsschacht hat dich in die Düsternis der Notbeleuchtung gespuckt. Der Gestank von {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} und verbranntem Fleisch macht deine Übelkeit nur noch schlimmer. Du hast eine Gehirnerschütterung erlitten. Dein Ellbogen steht in einem unnatürlichen Winkel ab, dein gesamter Körper schmerzt. Doch die Schmerzen haben auch etwas Gutes: Sie bedeuten, dass du noch lebst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. The smell of {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} and burnt flesh only adds to the nausea, confirming that you have suffered a concussion. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aufzugsschacht hat dich in die Düsternis der Notbeleuchtung gespuckt. Der Gestank von Promethium und verbranntem Fleisch macht deine Übelkeit nur noch schlimmer. Du hast eine Gehirnerschütterung gelitten. Dein Ellbogen steht in einem unnatürlichen Winkel ab, dein gesamter Körper schmerzt. Doch die Schmerzen haben auch etwas Gutes: Sie bedeuten, dass du noch lebst.{/n}

Doch die Schmerzen haben auch etwas Gutes: Sie bedeuten, dass du noch lebst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cage d'ascenseur vous a {mf|expulsé|expulsée} dans la pénombre à peine dissipée par les éclairages d'urgence. La soudaine nausée qui vous prend, accentuée par l'odeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} et de chair brûlée qui flotte dans l'air, confirme que vous avez subi une commotion cérébrale. Sans même parler de votre coude, tordu dans un angle pour le moins étrange, tout votre corps vous fait souffrir le martyre. Malgré toute cette souffrance, vous retenez néanmoins un point positif : vous êtes encore en vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The elevator shaft has expelled you into the dim of the emergency lights. Your elbow is twisted at an odd angle, and your body is wracked with pain. But there is a silver lining to all the agony: it means you are not dead yet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Asansör boşluğundan ikaz lambalarının loş ışıklarına varıyorsun. {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Prometyum{/g} ve yanık et kokusu burnuna ilişip mideni daha da bulandırıyor. Beyin sarsıntısı geçiriyorsun. Dirseğin bükülmüş, garip bir açıda duruyor ve tüm vücudun acıyla inliyor. Gerçi ağrılarının sana hatırlattığı bir tesellin var: Hâlâ hayattasın.{/n}
